spacewars.game

Class Special

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • doAction

        public void doAction(SpaceWars game)
        This is an implement method for doAction. Does the actions of this type of ship for this round. This is called once per round by the SpaceWars game driver. The special type spaceship is always accelerating and will attempt to face enemies and fire at them when in range. If it feels threatened and is energized enough it will teleport. else if it's threatened or its health is within danger zone it will attempt to avoid nearest spaceships.
        Specified by:
        doAction in class SpaceShip
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.
